title: Aviano Sans updated with new OpenType features and weights.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Aviano-Sans-Poster-2_4914.png)

Aviano Sans' 2009 update includes two new weights, Thin and Black. All weights include 42 new Art Deco inspired alternate characters and 40 unique ligatures.

Previous customers can download the updated files for free using the MyFonts.com update mechanism, and upgrade packages that include the new weights are available. 25% off for a limited time.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131512/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-sans/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-sans/")
author: Jeremy Dooley
